title: Mascha Parpaja
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mascha Parpaja, meaning "Butterfly Witch" in Occitan, is a restaurant and guesthouse located in a small alpine village in Southern Piedmont. Offers dinner-only with 3 veggie appetizers and 2 lacto-ovo-vegetarian choices in each course available. Will cater for vegans upon request. The cook will offer non-cruelty food based on traditional Piedmontese and Occitan recipes. Italian, English, French, German and Spanish spoken. Rooms and massage service available.
